title: Preventing Respiratory Viruses
content:
Prevention strategies
Core prevention strategies
CDC recommends 5 core prevention strategies for everyone to help protect themselves and others from severe respiratory illnesses.
CDC recommends that all people use core prevention strategies. These are important steps you can take to protect yourself and others:
